archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0432
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a BSS Solution, I want to be able to generate standard reports on customer billing so that I may analyse the billing data, and easily share this report data with other users (Act Mgrs, Service Del Mgrs etc)

properties.value: What type of reports? Details can be discussed on dedicated meeting

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
